moves.1. e4: This is from a themed tourni, and I stopped playing E4 because of the Sicilian
moves.1... c5: I debated going for a Smith Morra gambit, but played the more conventional NF3
moves.2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nc6 5. Bb5: More usual would be Nc3 but I thought I would givw this a go
moves.5... Bd7 6. O-O: King tucked away nice and safe
moves.6... Nf6 7. Nc3 Nxd4 8. Bxd7+ Qxd7 9. Qx: It is all equal, but Black is slightly behind in terms of development and the bishop is boxed in
moves.12... O-O 13. Rfd1 Rfd8 14. a4 a6 15. Ra: I am trying to open up the centre by getting black to play d5 with the discovered attack on the rook
White come out of the exchange ahead
moves.23... Qxa3 24. Rd7: Black is in serios trouble now
